name: BATU - FULL VERSION
description:
Simple puzzle game exploration "BATU".

You have to crack every code in each level, and open the gates that will take you

home

 

So why are you in this place ??
Find the history paper at each level so you know why you were there,

Crack the code in each level, find out its history and explore beautiful landscapes..

.

.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

OS: Windows XP SP2+
Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory
Storage: 1 GB available space

.

DEMO VERSION =

https://mim26.itch.io/batu-demo
